Text: After you install it, how do you install the additional plugins that are supposed to be included, like Keylight and Color Finesse?
This will install the Standard Version, NOT the Professional. Pro serials starts with 1063- and this generates serials starting with 1064-

In fact try 

"Once installation is complete, run the app and quit. 

Wait about 30+ seconds* and then delete the 'Adobe After Effects 7.0' Folder from your Applications folder and empty the trash. 

Reinstall the DEMO, this time selecting the 30 day trial option and continue. Once the installer is finished the application will launch as pre-registered with your previous details/activation now complete with all the pro plug-ins and options available.

*(The reason for the 30 seconds is that a couple of the After Effects elements take a little bit to quit even after the application has disappeared, therefore emptying the trash early on the 'Adobe After Effects 7.0' will produce a few 'could not delete' errors.)

You have successfully installed the Pro version!

Now launch it and you will have a fully functional Pro version!
"
Those instructions work for the Mac version perfectly. Too bad the same doesn't work for PC.
